Online marketing is an integral part of ecommerce nowadays and includes many different ways of companys presentation, such as email marketing, content marketing, social media, affiliate marketing and so on. The aim of the article is to highlight the importance of email marketing due to the fact, it is considered as one of the most effective communication tools. The part of the article are also fundamental metrics used in email marketing such as delivery rate, open rate and click through rate. In the end of the article are recommendations and suggestions for creating of successful email. The eyetracking technology was also used to analyze the gaze of Internet users at mailbox.
